reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, soft, and versatile, noting it can be dressed up or down for various occasions. Customers disagree on how flattering the dress is, with one noting it shows every bump and bulge.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars NIce versatile dress!
items.body: Nice fit. I'm 5', 114 lbs and it looks sophisticated and is comfortable. I wore it to a wedding and will be versatile for many occasions. Material is soft and moves well, yet not too thin. Plus it seems very well made. Great buy for the $. Read more
items.author: Syl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5 Stars Recommend
items.body: Absolutely LOVED this dress and received so many compliments. Looks exactly as advertised and fit perfectly. It was super comfortable and stretchy. I can’t say enough good things about this dress. You should absolutely purchase this as soon as possible Read more
items.author: Abigail

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality
items.body: It was a nice dress, just not for girls with belly. Showed my insecurities. Quality is good though. Read more
items.author: Angel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the Dress
items.body: This dress is adorable! You can dress it up or down. It is very comfortable and flattering. I am 5'2 and about 128 lbs. and I ordered a medium. It fits nice. Definitely would purchase in more colors. I also have the short sleeve version. Read more
items.author: Jeannine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Anrabess is the BEST
items.body: I love this dress, the fit, the fabric, the craftmanship, the color, the wash and wear with no loss of color or shape makes it one of my favorites. I purchase several styles from Anrabess and will continue to shop their line. Read more
items.author: Marguerite Thompson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best dress!!!
items.body: These dresses are AMAZING! I have in the sleeveless as well. They are so flattering and elegant yet feel like pajamas as they are so soft! I have them in multiple colors and get so many compliments. I would size down though. Size chart said I needed a medium but small was still roomy on me. For reference I am short 5’2 and weigh 135. I have also washed them in cold water and hung to dry and they do not shrink even though they have rayon. Read more
items.author: kathleen White

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Just okay
items.body: It’s an okay dress… Read more
items.author: Ashley Flowers

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Spanx not included and needed!
items.body: Comfortable! But this dress shows every bump and bulge. I wore to a casual wedding in November. Wore with boots and it kept me warm. Dressed up with gold jewelry, and it looks nice. Read more
items.author: MyPinkBlessing

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Cyan, Khaki, Deep Green, Burgundy, Royal Blue, Army Green, Dark Blue, Deep Gray, Black, Coffee, Navy Blue, Deep Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
